title: Horizontal line
text: The y-coordinate of both points is $$2$$. Therefore it is a horizontal line.
speech: The y-coordinate of both points is  2 . Therefore it is a horizontal line.
pacedSpeech: The y-coordinate of both points is   2
. Therefore it is a horizontal line.

title: Writing the equation
text: Write the equation of the horizontal line.
speech: Write the equation of the horizontal line.
